Description: A Florida-based corporation that manufactures, imports, and distributes products used in residential and commercial construction has agreed to pay the United States $160,933 to resolve allegations that it imported roofing underlayment product manufactured in China without country of origin markings.

Gardner-Gibson, Inc. paid a $650,000 penalty to resolve violations of the Clean Water Act related to the release of 60,000 gallons of hot, liquid asphalt from its Gardner-Fields, Inc. facility in Tacoma, Washington.
Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department

Description: Settlement of fine over permit regulations.
Agency: South Coast (CA) Air Quality Management District

NAICS Translation: 324122: Asphalt Shingle and Coating Materials Manufacturing
